text: So, when it comes to LED strip lights, there are no hardware or tools that are needed. The lighting is set in place by adhesives that are actually on the back strip of the LED light, which is definitely time-consuming and more convenient when you don't have those type of tools or hardware. So, that's pretty much it. There was nothing else that I needed besides the stuff they provided.
